      • initialize

        public static void initialize​(boolean overwrite,
                              boolean suppress)
        Initializes the logger.
        Parameters:
        overwrite - Indicates whether the log shall be overwritten always or not.
        suppress - Indicates whether the debug messages should be suppressed or not.

        Writes to the log.
        Parameters:
